content.rendered:
Directed by Anil Ravipudi

Written by Anil Ravipudi. Anil Ravipudi. Anil Ravipudi. Narra Praveen. G. Adi Narayana. S. Krishna. Rafi Warsi

Cast Mahesh Babu (Maj. Ajay Krishna). Rashmika Mandanna (Samskruthi). Vijayshanti (Bharathi). Rajendra Prasad (Capt. Prasad). Prakash Raj (Yeddula Nagendra). Tanikella Bharani (Minister). Rao Ramesh (Samskruthi’s father). Murali Sharma (Gen. Murali Sharma (as Murli Sharma)). Satyadev Kancharana (Capt. Ajay). Krishna Murali Posani (Insp. Krupanandam). Chaitanya Krishna (Ravi). Sangeetha (Swarajyam). Jayaprakash Reddy (Nagendra’s father). Raghu Babu (Teacher Tirupati Rao). Ajay (Nagendra’s Henchman). Vennela Kishore (Kishore). Subbaraju (Crime Branch Koti). Rajeev Kanakala (Ramakrishna). Ganesh Babu (Blade Ganesh). Satya (Samskruthi’s prospective groom). Brahmaji (Mrudanga Rao). Hari Teja (Swecha). Kaumudi (Swatantra). Prabhu (Medical college dean). Surya Kumar Bhagawan Das (Surya Rao). Siva Akula (Narayana). Kumanan Sethuraman (Old Man (as Kumunan Sethuraman)). Haji Mohammed (Terrorist). Josh Ravi (Kathi). Malhottra Shivam (Ramana). Rajveer Ankur Singh (Haider). Yarlee (Terrorist). Anil Sunkara (Special Appearance). V.J. Sekhar (Special Appearance). Anil Ravipudi (Special Appearance). Dil Raju (Special Appearance). Devi Sri Prasad (Special Appearance). Tamannaah Bhatia (Tamannaah Bhatia (in the party song. ‘Daang Daang)). Sreenivas Sai. Pallavi. Ashwini. Alka Rathod. Roopa Lakshmi. Rajitha. Jabardasth Appa Rao (Ticket collector). Rocket Raghava. Dora Babu. Pavan Santhosh. Gowtham Raju. Duvvasi Mohan. Gemini Suresh. Sri Sudha. Parvathi. Ramachandra. Jagadish. Meka Rama Krishna (Bharathi’s son-in-law’s father (as Ramakrishna Meka)). Narra Srinivas (Nagendra’s party member). Ramesh Reddy (Bharathi’s son-in-law’s uncle). Guru Charan (Bharathi’s son-in-law). Surender Reddy. Shiva Malhotra. Master Karthikeya. Baby Krithika. Baby Sai Tejaswini. Railway Ravi Kiran. Prathap. Nandamuri Prasad. M.M. Naidu. Rajsekhar Aningi. Devi Charan. Mukhtar Khan. Racha Ravi. Chandoo Sai. Railway Srinivas. Abhinaya. Gautam Raju. Krishna Chaitanya (Sniper). Pallavi Dora (Pallavi). Bhanu Prakash (Him self). Veera Ravi Kumar Yalla

Languages Telugu

Producers Sivaram Devarapally. Krishna kishore Garikipati. Ujwal Hegde. Raj Kumar. Koti Paruchuri. E.V. Rajkumar. Dil Raju. Sunkara Ramabrahmam. Jonty Singh Rawat. Ajay Sunkara

Production AK Entertainment. G. Mahesh Babu Entertainmen. Sri Venkateswara Creation
